quest.name: Lone Loporrit
journal:
 Quest Sync
The bashful Loporrit has a secret to tell you.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “going my way” to call the Loporrit out.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: Oh! Um, excuse me. You're the visitor from Etheirys, right? If it's all right, I'd like to have a word with you. In private.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: It's, well... I can't talk about it here. Might we step outside of Bestways Burrow? I'll be waiting for you around the northern end of Mare Lamentorum.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: You really came! Good, good. So, you see... The thing is, I, uh... There's someone I want you to meet.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: He's not like the other Loporrits, which I guess is why he lives so far removed from everyone. He very much enjoys his privacy, and will only show up if you speak his password first.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: The password is, um... “Going my way.” Think you can remember it?

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: He won't come out without the password─“going my way.”

dialogue.name: SAYTODO
dialogue.text: going my way

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “going my way” to call out the Loporrit.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)Hm...? Those thunderous footfalls and sonorous tone aren't at all like a Loporrit. Who goes there?

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: Um... I-It's me! I brought someone I'd really like for you to meet.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)...Very well. You may enter.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: Go on, talk to him. He doesn't allow just anyone here, you know.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: A pleasure to meet you. My name is Goingmyway.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: “A rather odd name,” you might say, but I can think of nothing more apt to describe the way I choose─nay, the way I was born to live!

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: Ever since the one thousand two hundred and forty-first inspection, I have longed to be free. So I stopped using the hibernation chambers and came here to live in secret and solitude.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: I found him here by accident one day when out searching for supplies. I promised to keep his secret and we've been friends ever since.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: I made an exception for you because, well... He likes rare and unusual things, and you're by far the most rare and unusual thing I've ever seen. I-I mean that in the best possible way, of course.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: A visitor from Etheirys, at long last... I bid you welcome to the moon!

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: My friend here tells me you're an adventurer. Ah, what a life that must be. I too yearn to journey in search of the unknown, and to that end I have labored to build a ship that may one day take me to explore the other side of the moon.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: And I hope he makes it there soon! Ah, speaking of which, I'm sure he was busy at work before we barged in here. We should probably let him get back to it.

dialogue.name: GOINGMYWAY
dialogue.text: You're more than welcome to visit again, and to join me on my voyage once my vessel is complete!

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: Thank you for, um...for meeting my friend. He thinks outside of the carrot patch, so it's nice to spend time with him from time to time.

dialogue.name: FIDGETLOPORRIT04252
dialogue.text: B-But please don't tell anyone. It has to be our little secret!
